meanings.sent1: Wearing wet socks all day is disadvantageous for your health.
meanings.sent2: It is disadvantageous to play with fire near flammable materials.
meanings.sent3: It would be disadvantageous to bring an umbrella to a sunbathing competition.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring warning signs can be disadvantageous like walking into a lion's den.
meanings.sent5: Eating expired food can have disadvantageous effects on your stomach.

meanings.sent1: Staying up late is disadvantageous for your energy levels the next day.
meanings.sent2: It is disadvantageous to skip breakfast before a big exam.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a winter coat in the summer would be disadvantageous.
meanings.sent4: Being stuck in traffic can be disadvantageous when you're running late.
meanings.sent5: Leaving your phone at home can prove disadvantageous in case of emergencies.
